overview: Scott Huennekens has served as President and Chief Executive Officer since April 2002. From January 2000 to March 2002, he served as the President and Chief Executive Officer of Digirad Corporation, a medical imaging company. Mr. Huennekens is a member of the Board of Directors for Volcano Corporation, Uptake Medical, the Medical Device Manufacturers Association (MDMA), and BIOCOM. He received a B.S. in Business Administration from the University of Southern California and an M.B.A. from Harvard Business School.
